snippet.title: Trackmania Wii Trailer
snippet.description:
TrackMania, the most fun-filled racing game played by millions of players worldwide, makes its big entrance in the console world with this remarkable adaptation for the Nintendo Wii! The sensations, the unquestionable fun and the unique gameplay of this legendary car game are intact!

Using your Wiimote and your Nunchuk, your Classic Controller or your Wii Wheel, drive racing cars at incredible speeds on spectacular tracks full of ramps, loops, turbo boosts, and other crazy track-blocks. 

Impeccable production and rich content provide TrackMania on Wii with everything it needs to become the most fun-filled and complete racing game on Nintendo Wii.
